      • serializeFields

        public static org.bson.conversions.Bson serializeFields​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper,
                                                        org.bson.conversions.Bson object,
                                                        org.bson.codecs.configuration.CodecRegistry registry)
        Serialize the fields of the given object using the given object mapper. This will convert POJOs to Documents where necessary.
        Parameters:
        objectMapper - The object mapper to use to do the serialization
        object - The object to serialize the fields of
        registry - Codec registry
        Returns:
        The Document, safe for serialization to MongoDB

      • serializeField

        public static Object serializeField​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper,
                                    Object value,
                                    org.bson.codecs.configuration.CodecRegistry registry)
        Serialize the given field
        Parameters:
        objectMapper - The object mapper to serialize it with
        value - The value to serialize
        registry - The codec registry to be used for serialization
        Returns:
        The serialized field. May return the same object if no serialization was necessary.
